attributes.action: Make Tom Moor a Sir for all he has done for the NHS and this country.
attributes.additional_details: I would like Parliament to recommend Tom Moor for  knighthood.
attributes.background: Tom Moor has raised a large amount of money for the NHS, he also has done a lot for this country. He is now 100 years old and now deserves some recognition.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
